column1: #Text=I 'll tell him I tried to stop you , but you escaped .
#Text=" Rebel says : " No , we ca n't .
#Text=" Rebel says : " Get him out of here !
#Text=" Korra says : " We 're all part of the same tribe .
#Text=I do n't wan na hurt you .
#Text=" Rebel leader says : " He would n't help us .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Thank you for saving my life .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm just glad I got here in time .
#Text=I want him to freeze in prison with the rest of these traitors .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , you ca n't just lock them away .
#Text=That will only make the South angrier .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You want them to go free ?
#Text=But let them stand trial for what they did .
#Text=Every Water Tribe citizen deserves that right .
#Text=I will respect the Avatar 's wishes in this matter .
